1626450.name: Galactic Speed Legends
1626450.description:
Welcome to the ultimate tabletop racing showdown! In this fast-paced strategy game for 4 players, each race is a tactical battle where only one champion will rise. Mix speed, sabotage, and clever card play to dominate the track. Do you have what it takes to outsmart the other 3 competitors and become the one true champion? The race begins now!

Key Features

  • Dynamic Card System: Play strategic turbo cards to surge ahead, sabotage cards to disrupt your rivals, and repair cards to fix your damaged vehicle after collisions or unlucky events.

  • Damage Mechanics: Crashes, sabotage, and risky moves can damage your racer, slowing you down unless you manage your resources wisely.

  • Event Tiles: The track is filled with special tiles that trigger game-changing effects—some grant bonuses like extra speed or cards, while others cause setbacks like damage or skipped turns.

  • Short or Long Championships: Play quick tournaments for instant fun or dive into extended championships to experience the full thrill of progression and rivalry.

  • Solo or Local Multiplayer: Play against smart AI in solo mode or challenge your friends in local multiplayer for intense couch competition.

  • Fantastic & Fun Original Soundtrack: Enjoy a vibrant and energetic OST that keeps the adrenaline pumping and the mood lighthearted throughout every race.

  • Alien Racers & Custom Vehicles: Choose from a variety of species from distant galaxies, each with unique traits, and customize your interstellar racing vehicle to match your playstyle.

  • Competitive Tabletop Style: Every decision matters. Every card can shift the outcome. Perfect for players who love strategy, surprises, and high-stakes action.
